xldoc.name: index
xldoc.title: Work with ProofPower in LaTeX/PDF (aka: THE SHED)

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: This directory contains a collection of fragments of work using ProofPower in LaTeX documents converted to PDF for viewing. They are mainly philosophically motivated, but doing anything formally requires a lot of purely technical infrastructure, and so the philosophical connection may not be obvious. Listed in roughly inverse chronological order of document creation, left column most recent.

sbcol.subsec: Some presentations, given or in preparation,
